articles.title: Facebook is shutting down TikTok clone Lasso and Pinterest rival Hobbi - CNBC
articles.description: Facebook is planning to shut down TikTok rival Lasso and Pinterest rival Hobbi on July 10.
articles.content:
Facebook confirmed that it's shutting down two of its little-known social media apps shortly after their launch.
TikTok rival Lasso and Pinterest rival Hobbi will both be terminated on July 10.
